title: Classic Pearl Necklace
subtitle: Timeless elegance
description: A stunning strand of lustrous freshwater pearls, each carefully selected for its exceptional quality and radiance. This timeless piece features graduated pearls ranging from 7-9mm, secured with a delicate 14k gold-plated clasp adorned with a single zirconia accent.

title: Pearl Drop Earrings
subtitle: Graceful movement
description: Elegant drop earrings featuring 8mm cultured freshwater pearls suspended from delicate gold-plated chains. The pearls catch light beautifully with every movement, creating an effortlessly chic look.

title: Pearl Tennis Bracelet
subtitle: Refined luxury
description: An exquisite tennis bracelet featuring perfectly matched 6mm freshwater pearls, each separated by delicate gold-plated links. The adjustable design ensures a comfortable fit from 6.5" to 7.5".

title: Classic Pearl Studs
subtitle: Timeless staple
description: Essential pearl stud earrings featuring 7mm perfectly round freshwater pearls with exceptional luster. Set in 14k gold-plated sterling silver with secure butterfly backs.

title: Single Pearl Pendant
subtitle: Minimalist beauty
description: A statement of simplicity—a single 10mm lustrous pearl suspended from a delicate 18-inch gold-plated chain. The pearl moves freely, catching light from every angle.

title: Solitaire Pearl Ring
subtitle: Modern romance
description: A contemporary design featuring an 8mm freshwater pearl set on a delicate open band. The pearl appears to float on the finger, creating a unique and modern aesthetic.

title: Layered Pearl Necklace
subtitle: Statement piece
description: Three strands of graduated pearls create a dramatic yet elegant collar effect. Each strand features pearls of different sizes (5mm, 7mm, 9mm) for dimensional beauty.

title: Pearl Huggie Hoops
subtitle: Contemporary charm
description: Small huggie hoops (12mm) embellished with tiny pearls around the outer edge. These earrings combine the comfort of huggies with the elegance of pearls.

title: Pearl Cuff Bracelet
subtitle: Statement elegance
description: An open cuff bracelet featuring five lustrous pearls evenly spaced along a polished gold-plated band. Adjustable design fits most wrist sizes comfortably.

title: Baroque Pearl Necklace
subtitle: Organic beauty
description: Celebrate natural imperfection with this stunning strand of baroque pearls. Each irregularly shaped pearl (10-12mm) is unique, creating a one-of-a-kind piece.

title: Delicate Charm Bracelet
subtitle: Personal story
description: A fine chain bracelet with three removable charms: a pearl, a star, and a disc that can be engraved. Add more charms over time to create your unique narrative.

title: Pearl Essentials Set
subtitle: Complete collection
description: A curated set featuring our classic pearl studs, single pearl pendant, and delicate pearl bracelet. The perfect foundation for any jewelry collection, beautifully packaged.

title: Pearl Lariat Necklace
subtitle: Versatile style
description: An innovative Y-shaped necklace with a sliding pearl that allows for adjustable length and styling. Wear it long, short, or asymmetrical—the choice is yours.
